headline: Fox Host Is ‘America First,’ but Makes Exception for Trump’s Iran Strike
abstract: The transformation of Pete Hegseth — an Ivy League-educated, decorated Army platoon leader — is a symbol of the Republican Party in the Trump era.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Immediately after President Trump ordered the killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani of Iran, some of the loudest applause was heard from Pete Hegseth, a Fox News host and a decorated veteran of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
